Description: I am thinning out my very large collection of stringed instruments (numbering nearly 200), which I began in the 1970's. Up for sale is a Hamer Artist Korina guitar with Seymour Duncan P-90 pickups, all original and in great condition. The korina top has some really beautiful mineral staining and some light figuring on the back. It's in excellent condition with the only minor wear being fretwear on the 1st - 5th frets. Comes with hang tag, warranty card and original case which shows some light cosmetic wear. A great blues and rock machine!
